rules.prover9_expression: (export_license_granted(regionA, cropX) | (-(weather_monitoring_active(regionA, techZ) -> water_supply_adequate(regionA, cropX)) -> pesticide_used(regionA, toolY)))
rules.natural: Either an export license is granted in region A for crop X, or, if it is not the case that whenever weather monitoring is active in region A with technology Z then water supply is adequate in region A for crop X, then pesticide is used in region A with tool Y.
A subsidy is received in region A, or, provided that fertilizer is applied in region A using tool Y, then yield is increased in region A for crop X.

Whenever training is provided in region A for farmers, then, if government support is available for region A, either research funding is approved for region A or a subsidy is not received in region A.

Provided that a technical manual is issued in region A, then, under the condition that government support is available for region A, either research funding is approved for region A or it is not the case that a subsidy is received in region A.
If expert consultation is scheduled for region A, then either training is provided in region A for farmers or a technical manual is issued in region A.
Under the condition that a field demonstration is organized in region A, then either training is provided in region A for farmers or a technical manual is issued in region A.
If market demand is high in region A for crop X, then it is not the case that the harvest is successful in region A for crop X.

Whenever a climate alert is issued for region A, then, if it is not the case that whenever a drought is declared in region A, then, under the condition that normal weather conditions do not prevail in region A, the harvest is not successful in region A for crop X, then emergency aid is requested for region A, then disaster relief is deployed to region A.
Provided that an irrigation system using technology Z is installed in region A, then weather monitoring is active in region A with technology Z.
Whenever water supply is adequate in region A for crop X, then, if normal weather conditions do not prevail in region A, market demand is high in region A for crop X.
Under the condition that fertilizer is applied in region A using tool Y, then soil quality is poor in region A.
Provided that fertilizer is applied in region A using tool Y, then it is not the case that soil quality is poor in region A.
Either fertilizer is applied in region A using tool Y, or, if an irrigation system using technology Z is installed in region A, then water supply is adequate in region A for crop X.
Under the condition that pesticide is used in region A with tool Y, then crop disease is not detected in region A for crop X.
If it is not the case that either expert consultation is scheduled for region A or a field demonstration is organized in region A, then the project is abandoned in region A.

Provided that it is not the case that either expert consultation is scheduled for region A or a field demonstration is organized in region A, then it is not the case that the project is abandoned in region A.

Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever a drought is declared in region A, then, if normal weather conditions do not prevail in region A, the harvest is not successful in region A for crop X, then it is not the case that emergency aid is requested for region A.

Provided that it is not the case that whenever weather monitoring is active in region A with technology Z then water supply is adequate in region A for crop X, then crop disease is detected in region A for crop X.
If it is not the case that a climate alert is issued for region A, then an evacuation is ordered for region A.
Provided that it is not the case that a climate alert is issued for region A, then it is not the case that an evacuation is ordered for region A.
If normal weather conditions do not prevail in region A, then the harvest is successful in region A for crop X.
